subject: Playoff Games
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Every Cardinals starter, including pitcher Adam Wainwright, who only gave up four hits, reached base at least once in a Game 4 rout of the Giants in the National League Championship Series.
snippet: Every Cardinals starter, including pitcher Adam Wainwright, who only gave up four hits, reached base at least once in a Game 4 rout of the Giants in the National League Championship Series.
